KScriptSetting.Name: RoutableTextRepository
KScriptSetting.Description: The repository that contains Objects that have Url route and Text body.
KScriptSetting.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 
      var page = k.site.pages.getByUrl("/pagename");
      k.site.pages.updateBody(page.id, "new page body"); 
    </script>

Method.Name: getByUrl
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 
      var page = k.site.pages.getByUrl("/pagename");
      var style = k.site.styles.getByUrl("/style.css"); 
    </script>

Method.Name: getUrl
Method.Description: get the relative Url of this object
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 
      var page = k.site.pages.getByUrl("/pagename");
      var url = k.site.pages.getUrl(page.id); 
    </script>

Method.Name: getAbsUrl
Method.Description: get the absolute Url of this object
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 
      var page = k.site.pages.getByUrl("/pagename");
      var url = k.site.pages.getAbsUrl(page.id); 
    </script>

Method.Name: all
Method.Description: Return an array of the SiteObjects

Method.Name: updateBody
Method.Description: Update the text value of the body property

Method.Name: get
Method.Description: Get an item based on Name or Id

Method.Name: update
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">
     
    var style = k.site.styles.getByUrl("/a.css"); 
    style.body = ".sample {}"; 
    k.site.styles.update(style);   
    
</script>

Method.Name: delete
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 

    var page = k.site.pages.getByUrl("/pagename"); 
    if (page)
    {
     k.site.pages.delete(page.id);
    } 
</script>

Method.Name: add
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">
  var page = {};
  page.name = "pagename";
  page.body = "new  body";
  page.url = "/myurl"
  k.site.pages.add(page);
</script>
